Articles.Content:
As it says... My Private Division account only shows KSP2 download, The previous versions have gonnnnne.

Cannot see any links here...

Do I need a top security clearance to see the link
KSP and KSP2 are two different games. That means that if you've purchased KSP2, you won't be able to play KSP, only KSP2.
Anybody have a link for KSP 1.12.5
Not to worry.. have it.

1 hour ago, Nazalassa said:

KSP and KSP2 are two different games. That means that if you've purchased KSP2, you won't be able to play KSP, only KSP2.

You know... If people that bought KSP2 would be entitled to play KSP1 too, I think that most users that asked for a refund would not had did it...

Could be that Private Division are on a Dollar Drive, as the parent/(or itself) company is laying off overseas staff in a big way.
Whether KSP2 is affected by this ... that remains to be seen, but it does not bode well considering that this early release is all but a wagon without a left wheel.
:)
